page.title: 18FARM SURVEY page 9
page.content: { {Greendown} Greendown is a farm of 94 acres. There are six pasture fields and four of these are used for crops of hay or silage this year. Two other fields are used for growing crops. This year they are growing barley. {Animals There are 340 breeding ewes on the farm. This year they have produced 600 lambs for meat. There is one calf being reared for meat, and one goose is kept. {Farm machinery } There are 4 tractors on the farm. Other farm machines are a mower, a dung spreader, a roller, hay turners and a large trailor. {Workers There are no full time workers. The farm is run by two part time workers.
